DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial No Cost Systemic Therapy Enrollment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether or not the patient was enrolled in a clinical trial that provided systemic therapy at no cost.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial No Cost Systemic Therapy Enrollment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The amount paid, charged, or engaged to be paid, for purchasing goods, services and financial instruments._Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The amount paid, charged, or engaged to be paid, for purchasing goods, services and financial instruments._Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The amount paid, charged, or engaged to be paid, for purchasing goods, services and financial instruments.
Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: means by which services are paid for.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
